TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LoginFailureAction extends System.Enum

summary.span: 确定当登录尝试失败时用户将转到的页。

span.span: Determines the page that the user will go to when a login attempt is not successful.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举可设置属性将用户重定向到登录页在 Web.config 文件中定义的登录尝试失败时。The following code example demonstrates using the enumeration to set the property to redirect the user to the login page defined in the Web.config file when a login attempt fails. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginLoginFailureAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginLoginFailureAction/CS/loginloginfailureactioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginLoginFailureAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginLoginFailureAction/VB/loginloginfailureactionvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction RedirectToLoginPage = int32(1)

summary.span: 将用户重定向到站点的配置文件（Machine.config 和 Web.config）中所定义的登录页。

span.span: Redirects the user to the login page defined in the site's configuration files (Machine.config and Web.config).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction Refresh = int32(0)

summary.span: 刷新当前页，以便 控件可以显示错误消息。

span.span: Refreshes the current page so that the control can display an error message.
